name: espocrm
description: EspoCRM is an open-source CRM that manages sales, leads, cases, and projects in a self-hosted web interface. It supports custom entities, workflows, and integrations, making it suitable for small to mid-sized businesses.
features: Sales Management: Track leads, opportunities, and deals. Complete sales pipeline.
Custom Entities: Create tailored data structures for your business. Flexible CRM design.
Workflow Automation: Automate repetitive tasks and processes. Boost team efficiency.
Case Management: Handle customer support tickets effectively. Organized support system.
Integration Ready: Connect with email, calendars, and more. Extended functionality.
Self-Hosted: Own your customer data completely. No vendor lock-in ever.
